name: Leap the mountain
description:
This is a level design for a platform jumping game. The player presses "Space" to jump and pass different levels. To stand on top of the towering mountain, overlook the vast world, and take in all the beautiful views, people refuse to stay put quietly. They continue to march forward and get through all difficulties to reach the summit.

Genre：Platform Jump game

How to play

Leap the Mountain is a 3D platformer in which the player needs to jump across many 3D platforms to survive and pass the levels. The player can freely choose the level to try. if the player accidentally falls off the platform, they can return to the level selection page to select a new level or exit
